Sword Marshal’s Boon.name: Sword Marshal’s Boon
Sword Marshal’s Boon.trigger: You use a warlord utility power that can target you or an ally.
Sword Marshal’s Boon.effect: The power targets both you and the ally.

Blade Flurry.name: Blade Flurry
Blade Flurry.flavor: You slash a foe, swoop to one side, and swing your blade against the same foe or another enemy within your reach.
Blade Flurry.requirement: You must be wielding a heavy blade.
Blade Flurry.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can shift 1 square. Make the secondary attack.

Diamond Blade of Victory.name: Diamond Blade of Victory
Diamond Blade of Victory.flavor: The presence of stalwart allies adds to the fury of your strike, which slices through the armored shell of your enemy and cuts deep into bone.
Diamond Blade of Victory.requirement: You must be wielding a heavy blade.
Diamond Blade of Victory.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. For each ally within 2 squares of you, the target takes 1[W] extra damage (maximum 4[W] extra damage).
